Title: Relates to reimbursement for anesthesia services
Summary: Relates to reimbursement for anesthesia services; provides that an insurer may use a time related reimbursement methodology for anesthesia services if such methodology is based upon criteria established by an independent organization.
LawCode: Add §§3246 & 4331, Ins L; add §365-q, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the social services law, in relation to reimbursement for anesthesia services
